TutorialPopupUtils_Text_24:
When you’re next ready for bed, press
the Sleep button in the bottom right
of the screen. Snorlax will promptly
begin snoozing, so join it in getting
some shut-eye after starting to track
a new sleep session.�

TutorialPopupUtils_Text_44:
You can change the alarms and other settings on
your Pokémon GO Plus + device by tapping the
Pokémon GO Plus + button in the lower-right
corner of the home screen in Pokémon Sleep.
Please ensure that your Pokémon GO Plus +
is nearby when you do so.�
